1.content:
First off, some explanations:

The city of Ishtef was once a very tiny fishing village with the biggest building being a large mansion owned by the goddess Ishtef, goddess of Fetishes and Health, over the years the city grew and grew, gathering kinky people from all over to indulge in their sexual sides. The city is a mixture of magic and science, with reformation chambers littering the town to keep it's inhabitants alive and fucking, even in the potion and magical trinket shops filled with various items to make your night, or day, a fun one.

There are four sections to this city, Northern, Western, Eastern, and Southern. Each district has a various number of houses, manors, apartments, etc, that house all the inhabitants, usually from the same series of game, book, cartoon, anime, etc. Though there are a few OCs(Original Characters) Who live in town, though it usually takes a lot for them to be brought into a house.

((If you have a suggestion for a house or character for a house, please note me.))
((Also, the houses and districts are in states of constant flux and additions, subtractions, and moving around))

((Also also, the Other option still up is just for my friend who has his character in that section))

1151111.content:
[Author's note: This particular Inkling is based on the boy from the manga, but speaking like he does in the game]

You are a blue inkling boy named... Blue. Not a very interesting name, but if it were anything more complicated, you might forget it. It's not like you're stupid or anything. You're just... forgetful. Like most Inklings, you've never really been outside of Inkopolis, except to attend a few fashion shows to check out the latest trends, and with good reason. It doesn't take much to reduce you to an ink splatter, and if anyone manages to catch you in your squid form, you're calamari. Despite how vulnerable they are, all Inklings love a good fight, yourself included (even though you forget the rules sometimes).

Today started like any other. You hopped right out of bed and took an ink bath. Despite being squids, water is practically toxic to you, so you simply clean yourselves with ink. "*sigh* Man, I totally got stomped last night. Would've been nice if those suckas I got teamed with coulda told me the rules", you gurgled to yourself as you sat in the tub of bright blue ink. Because of how forgetful you are, it sometimes takes a while for you to figure out what's going on. Despite that, your stats are pretty decent, though because they don't want to have to remind you of the rules and which team you're on, not many Inklings want you on their team. Because of this, you aren't very fresh. But you're looking to change that.

You managed to score some tickets to see the Squid Sisters, Callie and Marie, for tonight's sold out concert. You could convince a few others to let you on their team for the extra tickets if you wanted to. Then again, if the enemy team wins, they could be jerks and take them from you as part of their winnings, which would suck big time. That is, if you even remember you have the tickets. "Awright, let's do this!", you yelled, jumping out of the tub and heading out of your apartment... and once again forgetting to get dressed.

13.title: Southern

135.content: Where will this story take place in?
135.title: Southern Ishtef (continued)

1353.content:
You are Sari Sumdac, a techno organic girl living with the Transformer girls and one of the house leaders, the others being Arcee, the most famous Cybertronian girl; Slipstream, Arcee's Decepticon counterpart (and lover); and Red Alert, who runs the repair bay.

For someone your size, life here is pretty hectic. Being in constant danger of being squashed underfoot or ending up as someone's butt sticker are just a couple of things that could happen if you don't pay attention. Of course, being in charge of organizing their transportation service means the bigger girls try to avoid squishing you if they can. Though, some are more mean-spirited than others, like your evil counterpart, who has been given the oh-so inspired name of "Evil Sari". She's the one that gives you the most trouble, especially if you're in your child form. Your allspark key allows you to switch between your forms once a day (child, teenager, adult, and full robot).

Right now, you're just getting back from making the schedule for everyone's route, and you'd really like to change out of your child form before Evil Sari decides to prank you. "Darn it, where is that thing?", you ask as you rummage around your belongings in search of your key. Despite an hour of searching, it doesn't appear that your key is in here. "Oh geez, I hope SHE didn't take it", you groaned. You didn't want to think of what Evil Sari would make you do to get it back if she did have it.

"Alright, where did I have it last. I was helping out in the body shop, then I went to watch TV, then I set up the schedule... ugh! Where is it?!", you cried as you walked into the hallway, trying to think of where you might have misplaced your key.

Where do you look first?
1353.title: Robits

choices: No. You're left flattened into the indention of the couch.
Yes. You're left plastered to her ass.
13533.content:
After panicking for a little bit, you soon calm down. If your evil counterpart DID have your key, she would have gone out of her way to let you know she had it, and no doubt make you do something humiliating to get it back. You figure you had stressed out enough over it, and decide to take a break and search for it later. You head into the living room, which was currently empty, and scale the large couch to watch TV. Most of the furnishings here, aside from the restrooms and part of the kitchen, were made with the much larger Transformer girls in mind, which made you feel even smaller than your current form already was. However, having to find a comfortable spot somewhere in one of the large craters that was a butt indention was a small price to pay for enjoying the massive television.

After climbing up to the couch, you grabbed a throw pillow, laid back, and flipped on the TV. To you, the humans, and the mini-cons, the living room couch was more like a wide bed. "Man, the cushions never last that long", you whined as you scooted over to try and find a comfortable spot. You were too busy scooting around, that you failed to notice that someone else had entered the room. "Ahh. Much better", you said as you managed to find a spot on the couch that hadn't flattened out.

Just as you had managed to get comfortable, your vision was blocked out by two large, round gold objects. Looks like you weren't going to get to relax after all. All you were able to let out was an "Eep", before you were quickly smashed underneath the immense weight of the massive metalic ass.

Unfortunately, you had turned the TV up too loud for whoever was sat on you to hear your muffled cries for help. "Huh, someone left the TV on", you heard them say as they wiggled in the seat, grinding into you and crushing you even more. "Oh well. Ya snooze ya lose", she said as she sat forward and changed the channel. You soon heard the clang of a paint bucket hit the large table and you soon found out who had unintentionally made you into a seat cushion. It was Thunderblast. She always did her "makeup" while watching TV. This included a little bit of air brushing to her face, painting her nails, and applying a coat of paint to her lips (the Cybertronian girls equivalent to "lipstick"). If she was doing her makeup, that meant you were going to be underneath her for quite a while.

You soon heard the muffled screams of someone else under what was probably her other ass cheek. "Oh shut up, Lori", Thunderblast said, grinding her butt into the couch, bringing up more screams from who you guessed was Lori, and flattening you even more. "I've warned you plenty of times: Scratch my paint, and you end up underneath it. Hope you're comfy, Lori, cause you're gonna be staying on my ass for the rest of the week", she said, giving her gold painted ass a slap. This wasn't good. You had heard from Lori how awful it was to be trapped underneath a layer of paint and stuck to a part of their bodies. And given how often she makes trips to the body shop, you knew that you may be stuck to Thunderblast's booty as well. And since she didn't know you were there, you might be stuck for even longer.

Try as you might to cry out, Thunderblast simply attributed your cries for help to Lori, which were met with her mocking her little seat cushion as she did a few touch ups.

Soon, she had decided she looked good enough to head out, but not before grabbing a quick bite to eat. Grabbing her things, she stood up and headed into the kitchen.

Is she taking you with her?
13533.title: Couch Cushion

choices: She notices the little yellow pancake.
She doesn't notice before she sits back down.
Red notices you and shoos her away, saving you from further torment.
135331.content:
You never thought you'd be so glad to see Thunderblast's massive golden booty again, though this time you were witnessing it's ascent. As the robotic girl walked away, you were left flattened in the giant indention in the couch. "Ugh... my head...", you groaned. You looked like little more than a twitching yellow and brown pancake. "Some... ergh... somebody help me...", you moaned as you twitched, attempting to make any sort of movement. You struggled a little bit before you noticed a whirring noise.

"Seriously? Can you tiny things go five minutes without me having to bail you out?", you heard a voice say as you were slowly peeled off the couch. You recognized that nagging anywhere. It was Nickel, the adorable little maintenance bot. She may have been just barely big enough to not be categorized as a mini-con, but the bigger girls knew better than to mess with her, lest they get the nagging of a lifetime. "*sigh* Come on, Sari, let's get you to the repair bay. You'll probably have a smaller chance of being someone's bumper sticker there", she giggled as she sped off on her wheel-feet.

"Thanks, Nickel", you groaned.

"You can thank me by being more careful", Nickel quipped. "I can't be following you mushy little goofballs all the time, you know, and I certainly don't want to have to implement an hourly butt inspection. I mean how're you supposed to organize everything if you're someone's bumper sticker?" She continued going on and on, making sure to hammer the point home. "...So maybe carry a whistle on you or something to let everyone know not to squish you, kay?", she said, finally done lecturing you.

"*sigh* Yes, Nickel, I'll keep that in mind", you said, still aching all over as Nickel set you on a table.

"I'm just gonna leave you here for now while I go get Red Alert. You techno-organics are too weird for me to get a handle on, and I don't want to mess you up too bad", Nickel said while speeding off.

"Wait, you're just gonna leave me here?!", you cried out. It was no use, though, as the little maintenance bot was gone. "Oh well... at least I'm alone now."

As if on cue, you hear some clicking coming from above you. You shift your eyes up to the ceiling just in time to see a massive spider transform and land directly on top of you. *SPLAT* The massive purple booty seemed to belong to Blackarachnia, another techno-organic that lived in the house. However, just because her body was much softer, it didn't make her any less heavy. "Hey, Red! I'm ready for my inspection!" Her rough voice was muffled from beneath the spider's ass. She sat for several minutes, grinding her butt to get comfortable while waiting for the medic to arrive, scraping your already battered body into an almost unrecognizable yellow paste in the process. "Come on, Red, I've got places to be!" Her patience wearing thin, Blackarachnia stood up, your body stretching between her booty and the table for a brief moment before snapping off and sticking to the table.

"I'll have you know that you aren't my only patient", Red Alert said as she walked in.

"Yeah, I'm just the only one that matters", the spider snapped.

Fear gripped your battered form as Blackarachnia neared the table again, her spider abdomen hovering above you as you whimpered at the thought of becoming the arachnid's butt sticker, worse yet if she found you. You had been turned into silk enough times to know to avoid her.

The princess of the Candy Kingdom licked her lips. "I most certainly will! He looks so adorably delicious."
"Remember, there is a twenty-four hour time limit before he returns to me. Until then, you're free to do whatever you'd like." This made her feel much less guilty about serving you as a meal. However, that still doesn't mean you enjoy the trips you made through people's bodies.

"Oh, I'm sure you will. Humans happen to be a very rare delicacy in Ooo", she said. "But I don't think I've ever seen a human with such a high price. You must be especially delicious..." Princess Bubblegum was interrupted by a rapidly descending figure. "What the-?!" *squelch!* You stared in shock as Marceline, the Vampire Queen, had just sat on the princess, squishing her into the seat.

" 'sup, Bonni. Heard you finally had the guts to try this place out", she said, wiggling her butt a little.
All you could hear were muffled expletives from the princess.
Marceline then turned your attention to you. "Oh, man! You even ordered the owner's kid! You don't mind if I have a taste, do you?"
You closed your eyes and shivered in fear as Marceline bared her fangs. You heard a sucking sound, but oddly didn't feel a thing. She had only bitten into the cherry icing that made up your vest, drinking the pigment until it had become absent of color. "Mmm, not bad." Marcy stood up and bent down to reinflate the princess. "You mind closing your eyes, kid? She doesn't really like other people to see this."

You did as you were told. As you lied there, waiting to be eaten, a you started to feel weird. For the entirety of your short life, including the several months you had lived in Ishtef, and the countless bellies you had filled, you had never come into contact with anyone like you. Back where you came from, others regularly bullied you, mockingly calling you "gum boy" as they squished you and chewed you up like an actual piece of gum. You had finally found someone like you, who could maybe even help you understand your condition better, and she wanted to eat you.

"There ya go, Bonnibelle. Good as new", Marceline said. Princess Bubblegum didn't seem very pleased.
"Marceline, you know I can't stand that!"
"Yeah, yeah. Catch ya later." The vampire queen floated away, allowing the princess to return to her meal.
She sat down and carefully picked you up. "Now, then. Where were we?" She opened her mouth wide, allowing you to see the back of her throat.
This could possibly the only chance you had to be able to connect with someone who understood life as you saw it, more or less. If you didn't talk to her now, you might never get the opportunity again.
1541111.title: Bonnibelle

choices: Head out to one of the destinations now
15411111.content:
"W-wait!" You called out just as your hair touched her lips. "Yes?" Bonnibelle asked as she set you back down. "W-well I wanted to ask about well...How do you deal with being all squishy and gummy?" Bonnibelle smiled a little. "Ah yes, I heard you're new in town, basically how it works is that you end up just rolling with it, worst case it becomes annoying, best and usual case is you end up kinda liking it, admittedly I'd prefer getting plastered to an ass in my home or bedroom rather then in public, but in Ishtef you can't really be picky."

You listened as she listed off all this stuff, you were still learning the rules and laws of this place and inside you really wanted to know more so you can eventually leave home and meet new people, make friends, and just enjoy life.

"And that's how I ended up plastered to Finn's ass for a week, sorry I tend to ramble sometimes, but all I really want to say is this, in Ishtef you can generally roll with the squishings, and fun little fact, everyone's effected by cartoony physics, not all the time mind you but a lot more people share your plight then you'd think...just that some of them aren't your height." She giggled before licking him. "And you tasting absolutely amazing doesn't help." She said as she gave your forehead a kiss before her belly rumbled. "Well, I suppose my belly's calling for you." She said and stuffed you into her mouth completely, puffing her cheeks out adorably as she began chewing you up before swallowing you down and massaging her belly with a strawberry scented belch as Marceline sat on her head, staying light enough so she didn't squish both of you as you sat in her belly.

{A few hours later}

Bonnibelle hummed as she pushed you out of her bubble butt and onto a special mat your mom had bought that could rid you of the scent of butt once you rested on it. "Ahhhh, there we go." She said, blasting a fart that smelled of bubblegum into your face before pulling up her panties and dropping her dress and turned, handing you a piece of paper with directions. "Here you go, directions to my house, and a friend of mine's house, her name's Ruby, she runs a bakery near here, we'll both help you with your little problem." She said before kissing you on your head and heading out...only to be swept up, squished into a ball by Marceline, and dropped into the back of her pants before she floated out.

You blush as you watch that before looking at the directions and decide to...
15411111.title: Don't be a wimp! Talk to her!

154111111.content:
One was to Princess Bubblegum's house, well it's not really a house, more of a very symmetrical mansion, you've always been a fan of the show, you just have to go there!

Although, the other was to the Gloomy Bakery, run by Ruby Gloom. You had heard of this place, but you and your mom never got the chance to go in, maybe now's a good chance?
154111111.title: Head out to one of the destinations now

1541111111.content:
You decided that going to Bubblegum first would be a good idea, though your mom would be worried as she had become much more worried about you since and her moved here. You went to your mom and explained what had happened. "So, can you help escort me to PB's place?" "Hmm...Sure honey! We're in a bit of a slow time anyways, so sure!" She said and hugged him, a little too tightly as it ended up leaving an impression which soon filled back in as your followed your mother outside and into her car, you buckled up as she got in and buckled up as well and you two drove off, which you telling her the directions.

After a half-hour you were soon parked in front of a large mansion which was oddly symmetrical. "Here we are honey, you be good and remember to call when you're ready to go." she said, kissing you on the cheek as you got out and went inside. Inside you looked around at the spacious and rather expensive looking lobby, you then decided...
1541111111.title: The AT Mansion

15411111111.content:
(You, Princess Bubblegum, Marceline)

You decided to look for Princess Bubblegum, since you wanted to get help on your condition as soon as possible. She seemed like a nice person. Even better than from the show. You remember the she seemed a little bit cold sometimes. But she wasn't like that here. Also, you didn't failed to notice that she made the "being eaten" experience a bit more pleasant. And, despite the facet that you came out of her butt, which didn't smelled bad at all mind you, you kinda looked forward to being eaten by her again. You didn't got your hopes high tough. It was rumored, often, that she and Finn were in a relationship. You kinda hoped that they weren't, you had a little crush on her. Perhaps you'll get a shot?

"Hey there, kid."

You turned around and saw none other than Marceline, the Vampire Queen.

"H-hi there miss Marceline."

"Please, drop the formalities with me, okay? Just Marceline is fine.", she said, giving you fanged smile.

"Okay, Marceline."

"So, you looking for Bonnie?"

"Yeah. She said she could help with my condition and told me to come here or to go to her friend Ruby's place."

"I see. Well then, how about I help ya look for her?"

"Are you sure? I don't mean to impose."

"Nah. It's cool. However, I do have a condition."

"A-and what is it?"

"That, while we are searching, I get to keep you in here.", she pointed to her belly and licked her lips.

"Y-you want to eat me?"

"Yup! It jsut dosen't seem fair that Bonnie gets a taste of you and I don't. And don't worry, I'll let ya out when I find her, okay?"

"Um... Alright?"

"Oh, goodie! I was begining to starve!"

She threw you to the gound and, litterally, ripped you clothing to shreds, except for you boxers. She then grabbed you by the shoulder and your world became darkness as her fanged mouth descended on your head. She then used her vampiric strenght to lift you up, so that gravity could lend her a hand. She gulped, taking in your neck. She then expaned her jaws a bit more to accomodate you shoulders. Next to go where your arms and upper torso. She kept gulping until she got to your waist. Once there, she got a mischievous grin. She ripped your boxers and grabed your manhood. You had to clap your lips to keep from moaning. Marcy then began to stroke and lick your hard on with her hands and skilled snake-like tounge. You were trying very hard to to be too loud, but Marceline wasn't having any of that. She increased the peace of her strokes and licks and, once she felt you were almost there, she engulfed your lower torso, wast and upper tights and drew them into her mouth, causing you to shoot your load down her throat and your head to enter her stomach.

"Hmmmmm!!! Shho ymmmmmy (Hmm! So yummy)."

Once you were spent, she slurped what was left of your tights and your legs up like noodles and the rest of your body joined you in the depts of the Vampire Queen's belly.

"Uurrpp! You were quite yummy, you know?"

"T-thanks, Marceline."

"No prob. Now, let's go search for Bonnie."

She wandered the mansion looking for Bubblegum with you inside of her stomach, altough she took her time, so as to enjoy you being inside her as much as she could. After about two hours of searching:

"Hey, Marceline!"

"Oh! There you are, Bonnie."

"You were looking for me?"

"More like "we" were loking for you. The kid you ate today? He's in my stomach right now and wanted to talk to you. Hold on, I'll let him out."

Marceline then used her gag reflex to help her bring you back up. Once you were in her mouth, she droped to the ground and let you out gently, so as to not harm you. Which came as a surpires to you and to the princess as well, because Marceline was usually quite rough.

"What? The kid is brave. He wasn't afraid of me when I found him. Rather, he was quite friendly, so I took a liking to him.", she said, blushing a little. "Anyway, I gotta go. See ya later kid! I'll be sure to stop by your mom's place again to get another tast of you soon!", she said with a seductive grin and a wink.

"Well I'll be. Very few manage to befrined Marceline on the day they meet her. Hmm... Interesting. Putting that aside, I assume your here to get some advice on your "condition"?"

"Yes, Princess."

"When you're in my home, you can call me Bonnie or Bubblegum, okay?"

"Okay, B-Bonnie.", now you were blushing quite a bit.

"*giggles* You're so cute when you blush, you know? Anyway, follow me. We'll go to a place where we won't be disturbed."

"Okay."

You then followed PB and, once you arrived at your destination, you were surprised. Because PB took you to...
15411111111.title: To look for PB

154111111112.content:
... her lab.
((Continuing Maexam's trend of colored dialogue, because I like it and it's easier to read.) Jack (you), Princess Bubblegum))

You looked around and saw various lab equipment.

"Um, what are you planning?", you asked, a bit nervous.

"I'd like to study you, if that's alright", she said. "In order for both of us to understand your condition, we'll have to figure out just what you are, first", she said, poking your head, with the little indention soon filling back in, with a little bit of your mass sticking to her finger. "It's pretty clear you aren't entirely human", she giggled.

You blushed as you watched Bubblegum suck the little bit of you off of her finger. "W-well, my mom's human, but.. she did say she met my dad here, and I've seen lots of different kinds of people since I've been here, so I kinda assumed that I'm half-something else."

"Would you like me to help you find out what that other half is?", she asked.

You were a bit skeptical. The idea of being experimented on wasn't very appealing, but it was to help you, and she did ask for your permission first. "Well, it would be great to find out. Most doctors where I used to live were too weirded out to try to help me..."

"Good! Now, before we get started, I'll need you to strip down", she said before looking down at you, your clothes having been ripped off by Marceline hours before. "Oh, right. I guess Marcy already took care of that", she giggled as she picked you up and sat you on a table, where she proceeded to study you. She took out a spoon and scooped out some of your mass and set it on the table, using a tool to try and keep the hole open, though you simply reformed around it. "Interesting. Your body seems to act like a slime's", she said, taking a closer look at the bit of you she scooped out.



"So, I'm like a slime? Is that why my skin gets so sticky when I'm wet?", you asked.

"Well, it's not really "skin"", she said, cutting the bit of you in half and getting a good look at the chunk of your "flesh". "If you'll look closely, it's more like a protective outer membrane, keeping the rest of you in one shape and making you appear to be human... do you mind if I..."

You blushed as PB held the little bit of you. "S-sure."

"Thanks." She then pop the little bite into her mouth and chewing it up. "Mmm. You really are quite delicious", she said as she swallowed your bite and licked her lips. "... but that's enough for now. We'll have time for fun once we're finished up", she said as she collected tissue and hair samples. "Alright, now that we're finished with that, we can move onto the next batch of tests. Are you ready?"

"Uh-huh." Any skepticism you had was gone. The Princess seemed just as nice as she was at the restaurant. You didn't have any reason to worry. "I'm sorry I was so nervous before, it's just that... You were cut off as Bonnie put her finger over your lips.

"No need to explain yourself. You're still just a kid, so I can understand if you're scared of your surroundings and other people. Of course, your mom coddling you doesn't really help."

You had to admit that she was right. Most of your worldview came from what your mom told you, and she usually kept you sheltered at home back at your old house. Suddenly being brought to a place like Ishtef, it was entirely reasonable that you were a bit paranoid. "Yeah, I guess you're right... So, what kind of tests are we doing next?", you asked, a bit more enthusiastically.

"Let's see, I think we should move onto...
154111111112.title: Studying the gummy boy.

choices: You've been reduced to a smear on her booty.
1541111111122.content:
"I think we should see where your limits are before we start on anything too serious", PB said. "You should probably take strip down. Wouldn't want your clothes to get messed up", she chuckled

"Er, I... guess you're right", you replied as you slipped out of your clothes. You were a little embarrassed of her seeing you naked, though you really shouldn't be at this point. You've seen enough people walk around school nude like it wasn't a big deal. Which, it really wasn't. You hadn't lived here long enough to really be used to it yet. "Um, alright, I'm ready", you said, covering your genitals.

"Excellent. Since your body's properties are similar to mine, we'll start out with the gum test", she said.

"Gum test?", you asked. Before you could close your mouth, Princess Bubblegum grabbed you and squished you into a little ball before tossing you in her mouth. Her moans echoed around you as she licked your tiny gumball form, soaking you in her saliva. After enjoying your flavor for a minute, she wrapped her tongue around you and slid you underneath her molars. You knew what was coming next. You sat there and prepared for the inevitable as the Princess' teeth came crashing down out your tiny balled-up body, completely pulverizing you between her teeth. "Mmm! Simply delicious!", she cooed as she began chewing you up like a piece of bubblegum. If you hadn't been in this position several times before, you would find some sort of irony in this. PB continued to mash you between her teeth for several minutes before she suddenly stopped. You thought for a second that she was going to swallow you again, but your thought were soon answered as she began stretching you over her tongue. You were then pressed into the back of Bubblegum's lips as she began to blow you into a bubble, filling you with her sweet smelling breath. You were soon inflated into a large pinkish bubble with eyes, blushing a little as you were actually enjoying this a bit. It wouldn't take long for you to reach your limit, however, as you soon burst all over PB's face.

"Hehe, looks like we have more in common than I thought", the Princess giggled as she peeled you off. "I'll let you sit here and reform while I get ready for the next test", she said as she walked away. Your body had taken a beating, but you didn't feel too bad about it. In fact, despite what you had gone through, you seemed to be reforming much more quickly. Maybe what she said earlier had something to do with it. It didn't take long for you to return to your normal human shape. "I hope you're ready for your next test", you heard her say from behind you.

"Um, y-yeah whenever you-... o-oh." You expected her to have some sort of device to use on you, but as you turned around, your entire field of vision was directed to a large pink mass. You looked up, to find that she was looking over her shoulder, her bare bubble butt hovering directly over you.

"Now it's time for the booty test." You had little time to react as she allowed herself to fall back, landing ass-first on top of you with a *SPLAT!*. PB giggled as she ground her ass into you, squishing you into a fine fleshy paste. "Wow, you're rather comfy", the Princess said as she wriggled her rear on top of you. "I may have to borrow you sometime. You make an excellent cushion." She stood up after sitting on you for a while, before slamming her ass back into your battered body, causing you to make an audible squelching noise as she repeated. You sort of enjoyed this treatment as she pounded you with her booty, though you had a bit of worry in the back of your mind. Since your body had the same properties as her, didn't that mean that you could potentially fuse with her? You weren't allowed to think too much about it, as she put her full weight on top of you and ground you hard with her ass, smearing you across her cheeks for several minutes before stopping, simply resting on you for a bit before getting up.

"Hehe, I think I may have overdid it a bit", she giggled as she stood up. "But I think you did rather... uh, Jack?" She turned around, expecting to see the boy-turned-butt imprint, but you were nowhere to be found. She figured that you had gotten stuck to her and looked behind her.

What has become of you?
1541111111122.title: Gummy Limits

choices: Finn feels you start to move around and gets up.
He doesn't feel you. (Stuck for a while.)
15411111112.content:
As much as you wanted to find out how to deal with your condition, you felt overcome by your fandom for the show. "One little look around shouldn't hurt. I've got, like, twenty three hours before I teleport back to mom. Maybe Princess Bubblegum can help me with that, too..." You really appreciated that your mom went through the trouble of buying you that Curfew Potion, but sometimes it was more trouble for you than you would have liked. For example, you were never able to stay over at anyone's house for more than one day. You knew that your mother was only doing this for your protection, but you needed to be out on your own eventually. She couldn't baby you forever. You were glad, though, that the potion wore off after one year.

After wandering around for about ten minutes, you stumbled across an open room. The walls were decorated with all sorts of weapons. Swords, axes, ect. Decorated... as in they were sticking out of the walls. It was pretty messy, too. "This must be Finn's room." You started to walk around, admiring his weapons. You start to poke your chest and sigh as the little dent filled back in. "I wish I could be strong... Fight bad guys and stuff..." You noticed a particularly cool looking sword above the couch. "Hmm. I don't think he'll mind if I take a look at it." You climb over the couch and up the wall and try to pull it off, but you're too weak. "Hrnnnng! Come on, Jack!", you push yourself as you struggle to pull the sword out. Suddenly, you hear the door slam shut. Panicking, you slip off of the sword and fall down onto the couch, your body squishing a little bit from the impact.

"Whew! Infinite robot brawl's getting pretty tough!" Finn was covered in sweat, dirt, and oil; having just gotten back from training in his own pocket battle dimension. Even when vacationing, he still felt he needed to keep from getting rusty. "I think I need to chillax for a while."
Beemo jumped onto the table and tossed Finn his controller. "Bet you can't beat my new game, Finn."
"Haha, just you watch, Beemo!"
Just as you started to reform, a shadow cast over you. You looked up to see Finn's ass about to descend. "Eep..." *Squelch!* Your entire body was flattened like a pancake underneath the hero, making a perfect mold of his butt.
"Man, this couch is comfier than I remember. I've got a good feeling about this game." As Finn played the game, you tried to get his attention by wriggling. He was too heavy for you to squeeze out from under him. All you could do is hope that he noticed your struggles.
15411111112.title: Wandering Eye

1541112.content: You sighed as you passed up Princess Bubblegum's table. Being made of candy, she might have been nice to you and could even have helped you learn more about your condition. Alas, it would have to wait another day it seems. As your mother kept walking, the air around you smelled distinctly of peaches. The overpowering fragrance of her perfume could only mean you were being served to...
1541112.title: Your princess is at another table.

choices: "WAIT!" you yell, hoping to talk to her before being eaten.
15411121.content:
You blushed as you were set on the table of Princess Peach herself.

"I hope you enjoy my son, Princess," said your mom. You bowed gallantly, but timidly.

"I certainly will!" responded Peach.

Your mother then reminded her that you'd be restored after a 24-hour period. But you were nervous. What if the Princess would never let you go? Could something go awry?

Your mom left you two and returned to the kitchen. Princess Peach then lifted you toward her face with her right hand, keeping her left hand to her growling stomach.

"Wow, you're so CUTE!" cooed the Princess before licking her lips. "I can't wait to eat you up!"

With that, Peach opened wide and moved you toward her mouth...
15411121.title: Princess Peach

choices: After 24 hours, you're restored and returned to Mom.
154111212.content:
As you were popped into Princess Peach's moist, warm mouth, you were too nervous to say or do a thing. Once you landed on that slippery tongue of hers, Peach closed her lips tight. Then the tongue began to move you about, getting you soaked in saliva -- Peach was tasting you! After a minute or two of taste-testing and a satisfied "mmmmmm", the tongue flicked you into the dark chasm of Peach's gullet.

The Princess tilted her head back briefly and swallowed with surprising might. With a finger to her neck, Peach traced the journey of a small lump -- your tiny gummy form -- down her esophagus until it disappeared past her chest and into her belly.

Your descent into Princess Peach's body was quick. Her throat muscles wasted no time squeezing you down to your destination -- her soft, hot, slimy stomach. With a wet plop, you soon landed in your gastric prison. The walls were pulsating slightly, and digestion was bound to start soon. Needless to say, you were scared stiff.

On the outside, Peach gently rubbed her tummy, happy to have gobbled you up.

"That was delicious!" said Peach joyfully. "I wonder if any other gummy boys are out there..."

Will you be restored and back with your Mom after the 24-hour ordinance? Or will you end up spending eternity inside Princess Peach?
154111212.title: Down the hatch for you!

15411122.content: Is it Princess Ruto from Legend of Zelda or Ariel from the Little Mermaid?
15411122.title: This is fishy

15413.content: after learning this you wondered who it could be. your mum put you in a dish and sent you on your way. after about 3 or so minutes you look up to see the face off .....
15413.title: a regular customer who's celebrating their ...

choices: You run into the Rowdyruff Boys.
You notice an odd little girl in skates following you.
No. You make it to your destination without incident.
1542.content:
You played some video games as you sat in the break room, waiting until Trish finished up with a customer's order. While your usual job around the restaurant was being prepared as a dessert for others, being rented out as a toy, or entertaining guests, your mom sometimes gave you a break if you helped her with deliveries. This was apparently for a good friend of hers, so you knew you had to be careful with your cargo. After giving you the customer's order and going over the route you were to take, your mom kissed you on the forehead and sent you on your way.

You had to admit that you were a little bit scared of being out on your own. While you were a little popular at school, it was for the wrong reasons. You had spent a good portion of your class time being used as bubblegum, stuck to other students' shoes, or as a smear on their butts. You didn't mind it as much now, but there were still a few bullies at school that gave you an especially hard time, namely the Rowdyruff Boys. Living in the same region as them and not knowing your way around, you were usually worried about running into them.

That wasn't the only thing bothering you, though. Ever since moving here, you've felt like someone's been following you. You often hear a girl whispering and giggling behind you, sometimes being cut off by a squishing sound. You told your mom, but she just tells you you're being paranoid. The only time you feel alone is at home or, ironically, at school.

"*gulp* M-maybe I should've gotten a bodyguard...", you whimper as you head out, your arms wrapped around the delivery bag.


Does anything happen before you make it?
1542.title: Delivery Boy

choices: Wake up mom and her partner.
1543.content: What else will Jack be doing today?
1543.title: something else

15432.content: You rubbed your eyes as you woke from your deep slumber. You looked to your right to wake your mother up, but quickly remembered that you had your own room now. You were still adjusting to your new home. Trish had moved to Ishtef after learning about the various sexual experiences from your aunt. Having little success when it came to dating (partially because of your condition), she brought you along to start a new life. Entering your preteen years (mentally at least), she felt it was important to find you a father figure. After only a few weeks here, she met someone who changed both of your lives.
15432.title: Time to get up

154321.content:
Your mother knew that you were practically obsessed with the pokemon games back home. So you were both pleasantly surprised when you found out that there were not only Pokemon here, but anthros. Being in a new city, however, didn't keep you from getting squished. When helping your mother set up her new business, you were sat on by one of her new employees and stuck to their butt until your mom noticed. She was initially frustrated, but after seeing how kind and apologetic they were, a long "chat" helped smooth things over.

They had begun dating and eventually moved in with you and your mom. They helped you and your mom understand the goings on in Ishtef and helped Trish understand that with your condition, getting squished was just part of life. You were still getting used to her new lover and weren't quite sure what to think of your mother being in a relationship with...
154321.title: A pokemon anthro.

1543211.content:
You walked into the hallway toward your mother's room. Having witnessed all sorts of weird goings on since you moved, you knew to expect anything. Your mom and her significant other had also gotten you to "play" with them occasionally. While you were initially hesitant, your fondness for pokemon usually won over. As you neared the door to your mother's door, you could hear them moan in pleasure. You shivered, not wanting to think about what they were doing. As it was going to be opening time at the restaurant in less than an hour, you were going to have to.

You opened the door and groaned. Trish's sandy blonde hair was all that was sticking out of the goodra's lips. You knew that your mom had a vore fetish, so you had grown used to this scene. The goodra slurped her hair up like a piece of spaghetti and let out a soft *urp*. The large dragon pokemon then noticed you and chuckled. "G'morning Jackie!"

"*sigh* Good morning..."
1543211.title: Mom's dating a Goodra.

We're goin' on a picnic today."
1543221.content:
You never could believe your mom had hooked up with a My Little Pony character when she first told you but when you met Big Macintosh you were kinda hesitant to accept him as a figure of any kind, especially not a father figure, but after a week or two you started to warm up to the stallion, he was very nice and gentle, except for the few times he's sat on you, laid on you, farted in your face (His butt is at the same height as your head), and eaten you, you started to like him as a father figure.

You opened the door and went into your mother's room, you had always wondered how Big Mac slept in a normal bed, and you saw as he was sleeping in the bed like a dog, with his front legs pointed out towards the end of the bed, and his back legs tucked under him. You went over to your mother and nudged her. "Mom, time to wake up." You said before shaking her a bit more, she was always a heavy sleeper. You shook her for 10 whole minutes before she yawned and woke up. "Oh sorry honey." She yawned as she got up and got out of bed before going over and waking up Big Mac. "*Yawn* Mornin' Trish, mornin' Jack." He said as he stood up and got out of bed before walking out the door as you followed, getting an eyeful of his bouncing, red, well toned butt as you and him went into the parlor and started getting everything ready for the day while your mom got dressed.

He had finished helping you take the chairs down when he spoke up. "Oh Jack, got somethin' to tell ya. Me and Trish have been thinkin' it over and decided...
1543221.title: Big Macintosh

choices: Stay with Big Macintosh and follow him.
Explore on your own for a little while.
15432211.content:
You weren't too sure about meeting Applejack and the others. Having the mindset of an average boy, being surrounded by rainbow colored ponies wasn't exactly something that appealed to you. On top of that, if you were being taken to meet them, that probably meant you were going into the portal that lead to Ponyville, where you would no doubt be completely surrounded by the equines. Then again, you warmed up to Big Macintosh, and he was the best father figure you had ever known. Maybe you'd be able to get along with the others as well.

"Um, okay", you said.
Big Macintosh smiled knelt down, signaling for you to get on his back. You quickly hopped on and he galloped toward the house where the portal was. "Hey, isn't mom coming with us?", you asked.

"Nope. S'just you 'n me today", Big Mac said as he neared the house. You could see a rainbow colored light shining from behind the door. You tried to push open the door for him, but it was too heavy for your squishy gummy arms. He rolled his eyes and tapped the door with his hoof, causing it to fling open. Right in front of you was a bright, multicolored light; the portal to Ponyville. "Glad t'see ya decided t' come along", Big Macintosh said as he walked into the portal with you. It felt very strange, crossing over to another world, but it didn't seem to hurt you.

Once on the other side, everything suddenly seemed much brighter, despite seeming to be in a basement.
"Oh, hello Big Macintosh", you heard a voice say from the other side. "I see you brought a visitor."

You looked over to where the voice came from and saw a purple alicorn, just a little bit bigger than you. "Um, h-hi",you greeted.

"Hello there. You must be Jack, the gummy boy Big Mac was talking about", she said as she held her hoof out. "My name's Twilight Sparkle", she said.

You grabbed her hoof, and shook it as if you were shaking someone's hand. "I-it's nice to meet you", you said, still a bit unsure of what to make of all this.


After shaking your hand, Twilight noticed that some of your goo was left behind. "Oh, this must be the stuff you're made of", she said as she sniffed the little bit of you before licking it up. "Wow. It tastes just like strawberry cheesecake!", she said as she walked over to you and looked you over. "Hmm. You wouldn't mind if I ran a few experiments on you, would you?", she asked.

"Um, w-what kind of tests?", you asked, not sure of what she meant.

"I've just never seen anything like you before. I'd really like to know what makes your body work", she said. "That's up to you, though. I wouldn't want to get in the way of your day out."

You looked up at Big Macintosh to see what he thought. "Like she said, it's up t' you." He didn't seem to mind, but you knew he wouldn't make you do anything you didn't want to do.

It would be nice to understand a little bit more about just what you were. Though, you weren't entirely committed to the idea of being a squishy guinea pig. Then again, you did come here to spend time with Big Macintosh. And you were in an unfamiliar world. It would be wise to stick with someone you know.
But maybe what you needed was some time to yourself. You were in a world you had never been before, and you knew that Macintosh would let you go get acquainted with your surroundings for at least a little bit.

What are you going to do?
15432211.title: Visit to Ponyville

15433.content:
As you sat in your mother's car, you were more than a little bit nervous. For one, your mom was going to be going out of town for a few weeks, and she said you had to stay here. Normally you wouldn't mind. It's not like you couldn't take care of yourself. However, Trish didn't see it that way, and had talked someone she knew into taking care of you while she was gone. This is what scared you. You didn't know any of your mom's friends (mostly because you had your face glued to your video games), and you had never bothered to ask her what they were like. Heck, you didn't even know if whoever your mom was taking you to was even very well acquainted with her. Still, though, Trish trusted them enough to look after you, so maybe they'd be nice.

She gave you a kiss on the forehead and sent you on your way, informing you that your things had already been taken inside before driving off. Where would you be staying for now?
15433.title: Gooey little house guest

154331.content:
You stood before the stoop of a large and weirdly green manor before taking a deep breath and walked up the steps and knocking on the door. "Hello? Anyone?" You sigh before checking the doorknob and opening it, seems they were expecting you. "Hellooooo?" You called out. Nothing. Was no one home? Did they just forget to lock the door on their way out? Various questions passed through your mind that you didn't even notice the red glint in the shadows.

"BOOTY BOMB!" Yelled a weird gray skinned girl as she jumped from a corner of the ceiling and held her legs up. Your eyes narrowed as the fat jean clad ass slammed down on your gooey body, a load SPLAT filling the house as your form instantly molded to the girl's fat ass. "Damn you're squishy! Your mom wasn't lying!" She laughed, grinding her curvy rear into your soft and malleable frame before getting up, your body stretching between her ass and the floor. "Damn, didn't think you'd like my ass so much, afraid I just had time for this one booty slam, don't worry, I'll be doing more." She laughed as she peeled you off her ass and let you splat onto the floor.

It took a few minutes but you eventually reformed, shaking your head as you stood before a somewhat tall(er then you) girl wearing a white dress shirt with a pink evil looking squid head on it. "Greetings, I'm Rose. I suppose you're Jack?" She asked with confidence in her voice you wished you had some days. "Y-yes, I'm Jack...You know my mom?" You hadn't heard a thing about these people, you kinda wished you did now so that you would at least know who just turned you into an ass pancake.

"Yes, she comes by often for uh...personal reasons." She chuckled before showing you through the hallways. You didn't really know much about your mom's private life, and you'd rather keep it that way. "As I said I'm Rose, I'm co-house leader. Your mom has decided that it'd be best if you stayed with us for a few weeks. However you get the choice of where you'll be staying, sadly at the moment you can only pick from two rooms, the Lalondes, and the Pyropes."

You think on this, you have absolutely no idea who'll be in each room, so you just bite the bullet and pick...
154331.title: The Homestuck Manor

info.brief_description: The town of Ishtef, full of fetishes and adventure!
info.description:
Ishtef, the city of fetishes, and a home to all sorts of...interesting people, from Ancient Gods and Goddesses to the Undead, you can find just about anything and anyone in this city, it's also home to many old characters from various cartoons, games, shows, you name it, most of whom have stopped their careers and moved on to other jobs.

Explainations: ((Feel free to ask about anything, I love explaining!))

Houses: There's a law in Ishtef that states that a house that contains most of a show's/game's/whatever's (female) cast will get an appropriate amount of money a month, so a lot of people will live together in houses even if they're enemies. The Leaders of each house are called...House Leaders, and they're the ones who own the house and pay for everything.

Rules.
1.Anything is allowed, literately, ANYTHING GOES.
2.No Death however, as the city has Reformation chambers in every building which is required by law.
3.Please ask me if you wish to add an OC and please be clear on who and what they are.
4.Giants and Giantesses are another thing you should ask me about, as only four of each are allowed in Ishtef at a time, it is a kinky city, but they can't just have people tear everything down whenever they want.
5.Most Males are a no, I do like some males like Shippo from Inuyasha or Finn from Adventure time, but most are no's, so most groups are female only.
5.5: Please run any "More/other" options for girls pass me first, I really don't like having an interactive that's just "And more".
5.5.5: From here on out there will be only ONE "More/Other" option, any changes to other characters must be done in story.
6.Have fun!
